author: castagna
msg: Upgraded Lucene to 3.5.0: IndexWriter expungeDeletes() (used only in a test) and optimize() (used in IndexBuilderBase, but it could probably be removed) methods are now deprecated.

author: sarowe
msg: LUCENE-3305: Added IntelliJ IDEA configuration for the new Kuromoji analysis module

author: hwright
msg: Ev2 shims: zero-out delta editor batons when creating them, just to avoid
having to do so manually for default values.

author: sarowe
msg: LUCENE-3305: Maven configuration: Added dependency from Solr analysis-extras contrib on the new Kuromoji analysis module
